verses.verse: <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>
"This shall be the <S%H8451>law<s%> of the <S%H6879>leper<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of his <S%H2893>cleansing.<s%> He shall be <S%H935>brought<s%> to the <S%H3548>priest,<s%>

and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall go <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H2351>out<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp.<s%> The <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7200>examine<s%> <S%H5061>him,<s%> and behold, if the plague of <S%H6883>leprosy<s%> is <S%H7495>healed<s%> in the <S%H6879>leper,<s%>

then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6680>command<s%> them to <S%H3947>take<s%> for him who is to be <S%H2891>cleansed<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H2889>clean<s%> <S%H6833>birds,<s%> and <S%H730>cedar<s%> <S%H6086>wood,<s%> and <S%H8144>scarlet,<s%> and <S%H231>hyssop.<s%>

The <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6680>command<s%> them to <S%H7819>kill<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H6833>birds<s%> in an <S%H2789>earthen<s%> <S%H3627>vessel<s%> over <S%H2416>running<s%> <S%H4325>water.<s%>

As for the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H6833>bird,<s%> he shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H730>it,<s%> and the cedar <S%H6086>wood,<s%> and the <S%H8144>scarlet,<s%> and the <S%H231>hyssop,<s%> and shall <S%H2881>dip<s%> them and the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H6833>bird<s%> in the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H6833>bird<s%> that was <S%H7819>killed<s%> over the <S%H2416>running<s%> <S%H4325>water.<s%>

He shall <S%H5137>sprinkle<s%> on him who is to be <S%H2891>cleansed<s%> from the <S%H6883>leprosy<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6471>times,<s%> and shall pronounce him <S%H2891>clean,<s%> and shall let the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H6833>bird<s%> <S%H7971>go<s%> into the <S%H6440>open<s%> <S%H7704>field.<s%>

"He who is to be <S%H2891>cleansed<s%> shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes,<s%> and <S%H1548>shave<s%> off all his <S%H8181>hair,<s%> and <S%H7364>bathe<s%> himself in <S%H4325>water;<s%> and he shall be <S%H2891>clean.<s%> <S%H310>After<s%> that he shall <S%H935>come<s%> into the <S%H4264>camp,<s%> but shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H2351>outside<s%> his <S%H168>tent<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>

It shall be on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> that he shall <S%H1548>shave<s%> all his <S%H8181>hair<s%> off his <S%H7218>head<s%> and his <S%H2206>beard<s%> and his <S%H1354>eyebrows,<s%> even all his <S%H8181>hair<s%> he shall <S%H1548>shave<s%> <S%H3526>off.<s%> He shall wash his <S%H899>clothes,<s%> and he shall <S%H3526>bathe<s%> his <S%H1320>body<s%> in <S%H4325>water,<s%> then he shall be <S%H2891>clean.<s%>

"On the <S%H8066>eighth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> he shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> male <S%H3532>lambs<s%> without <S%H8549>blemish,<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> ewe <S%H3535>lamb<s%> <S%H1323>a<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> old without <S%H8549>blemish,<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> tenths of an <S%H6241>ephah<s%> of fine <S%H5560>flour<s%> for a meal <S%H4503>offering,<s%> <S%H1101>mingled<s%> with <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3849>log<s%> of <S%H8081>oil.<s%>

The <S%H3548>priest<s%> who <S%H2891>cleanses<s%> him shall <S%H5975>set<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> who is to be <S%H2891>cleansed,<s%> and those <S%H6440>things,<s%> before <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting.<s%>

"The <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> of the male <S%H3532>lambs,<s%> and <S%H7126>offer<s%> him for a trespass <S%H817>offering,<s%> with the <S%H3849>log<s%> of <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and <S%H5130>wave<s%> them for a wave <S%H8573>offering<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

He shall <S%H7819>kill<s%> the male <S%H3532>lamb<s%> in the <S%H4725>place<s%> where they <S%H7819>kill<s%> the sin <S%H2403>offering<s%> and the burnt <S%H5930>offering,<s%> in the <S%H4725>place<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary;<s%> for as the sin <S%H2403>offering<s%> is the <S%H3548>priest<s%>'s, so is the trespass <S%H817>offering.<s%> It is <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy.<s%>

The <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> some of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the trespass <S%H817>offering,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H5414>put<s%> it on the <S%H8571>tip<s%> of the <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H241>ear<s%> of him who is to be <S%H2891>cleansed,<s%> and on the <S%H931>thumb<s%> of his <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and on the big <S%H931>toe<s%> of his <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H7272>foot.<s%>
The <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> some of the <S%H3849>log<s%> of <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and <S%H3332>pour<s%> it into the <S%H3709>palm<s%> of his <S%H3548>own<s%> left <S%H8042>hand.<s%>

The <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H2881>dip<s%> his <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H676>finger<s%> in the <S%H8081>oil<s%> that is in his <S%H8042>left<s%> <S%H3709>hand,<s%> and shall <S%H5137>sprinkle<s%> some of the <S%H8081>oil<s%> with his <S%H676>finger<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6471>times<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

The <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H5414>put<s%> some of the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of the <S%H8081>oil<s%> that is in his <S%H3709>hand<s%> on the <S%H8571>tip<s%> of the <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H241>ear<s%> of him who is to be <S%H2891>cleansed,<s%> and on the <S%H931>thumb<s%> of his <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and on the big <S%H931>toe<s%> of his <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H7272>foot,<s%> upon the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the trespass <S%H817>offering.<s%>

The <S%H3498>rest<s%> of the <S%H8081>oil<s%> that is in the <S%H3548>priest<s%>'s <S%H3709>hand<s%> he shall <S%H5414>put<s%> on the <S%H7218>head<s%> of him who is to be <S%H2891>cleansed,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for him <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

"The <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> the sin <S%H2403>offering,<s%> and make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for him who is to be <S%H2891>cleansed<s%> because of his <S%H2932>uncleanness:<s%> and <S%H310>afterward<s%> he shall <S%H7819>kill<s%> the burnt <S%H5930>offering;<s%>

and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H5927>offer<s%> the burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> and the meal <S%H4503>offering<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar.<s%> The <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for <S%H2891>him,<s%> and he shall be clean.

"If he is <S%H1800>poor,<s%> and <S%H3027>can't<s%> afford so <S%H3947>much,<s%> then he shall take <S%H259>one<s%> male <S%H3532>lamb<s%> for a trespass <S%H817>offering<s%> to be <S%H8573>waved,<s%> to make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for <S%H259>him,<s%> and one tenth of an <S%H6241>ephah<s%> of fine <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H1101>mingled<s%> with <S%H8081>oil<s%> for a meal <S%H4503>offering,<s%> and a <S%H3849>log<s%> of <S%H8081>oil;<s%>

and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8449>turtledoves,<s%> or <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H3123>pigeons,<s%> such as he is able to <S%H3027>afford;<s%> and the <S%H259>one<s%> shall be a sin <S%H2403>offering,<s%> and the <S%H259>other<s%> a burnt <S%H5930>offering.<s%>

"On the <S%H8066>eighth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> he shall <S%H935>bring<s%> them for his <S%H2893>cleansing<s%> to the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> to the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting,<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

The <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H3532>lamb<s%> of the trespass <S%H817>offering,<s%> and the <S%H3849>log<s%> of <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H5130>wave<s%> them for a wave <S%H8573>offering<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

He shall <S%H7819>kill<s%> the <S%H3532>lamb<s%> of the trespass <S%H817>offering.<s%> The <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> some of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the trespass <S%H817>offering<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> it on the <S%H8571>tip<s%> of the <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H241>ear<s%> of him who is to be <S%H2891>cleansed,<s%> and on the <S%H931>thumb<s%> of his <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and on the big <S%H931>toe<s%> of his <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H7272>foot.<s%>
The <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3332>pour<s%> some of the <S%H8081>oil<s%> into the <S%H3709>palm<s%> of his <S%H3548>own<s%> left <S%H8042>hand;<s%>

and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H5137>sprinkle<s%> with his <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H676>finger<s%> some of the <S%H8081>oil<s%> that is in his <S%H8042>left<s%> <S%H3709>hand<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6471>times<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

Then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H5414>put<s%> some of the <S%H8081>oil<s%> that is in his <S%H3709>hand<s%> on the <S%H8571>tip<s%> of the <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H241>ear<s%> of him who is to be <S%H2891>cleansed,<s%> and on the <S%H931>thumb<s%> of his <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and on the big <S%H931>toe<s%> of his <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H7272>foot,<s%> on the <S%H4725>place<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the trespass <S%H817>offering.<s%>

The <S%H3498>rest<s%> of the <S%H8081>oil<s%> that is in the <S%H3548>priest<s%>'s <S%H3709>hand<s%> he shall <S%H5414>put<s%> on the <S%H7218>head<s%> of him who is to be <S%H2891>cleansed,<s%> to make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for him <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
He shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H8449>turtledoves,<s%> or of the <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H3123>pigeons,<s%> such <S%H834>as<s%> he is able to <S%H3027>afford,<s%>

even such as <S%H3027>he<s%> is able to <S%H5381>afford,<s%> the <S%H259>one<s%> for a sin <S%H2403>offering,<s%> and the <S%H259>other<s%> for a burnt <S%H5930>offering,<s%> with the meal <S%H4503>offering.<s%> The <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for him who is to be <S%H2891>cleansed<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>"
This is the <S%H8451>law<s%> for him in whom is the <S%H5061>plague<s%> of <S%H6883>leprosy,<s%> <S%H3027>who<s%> is not able to <S%H5381>afford<s%> the sacrifice for his <S%H2893>cleansing.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and to <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

"When you have <S%H935>come<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> which I <S%H5414>give<s%> to you for a <S%H272>possession,<s%> and I <S%H5414>put<s%> a <S%H5061>spreading<s%> <S%H6883>mildew<s%> in a <S%H1004>house<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of your <S%H272>possession,<s%>

then he who owns the <S%H1004>house<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> and <S%H5046>tell<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H7200><s%> 'There seems to me to be some sort of <S%H5061>plague<s%> in the <S%H1004>house.<s%>'

The <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6680>command<s%> that they <S%H6437>empty<s%> the <S%H1004>house,<s%> before the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H935>goes<s%> in to <S%H7200>examine<s%> the <S%H5061>plague,<s%> that all that is in the <S%H1004>house<s%> not be made <S%H2930>unclean:<s%> and <S%H310>afterward<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H935>go<s%> in to <S%H7200>inspect<s%> the <S%H1004>house.<s%>

He shall <S%H7200>examine<s%> the <S%H5061>plague;<s%> and <S%H5061>behold,<s%> if the plague is in the <S%H7023>walls<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> with hollow <S%H8258>streaks,<s%> <S%H3422>greenish<s%> or <S%H125>reddish,<s%> and it <S%H4758>appears<s%> to be <S%H8217>deeper<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> the <S%H7023>wall;<s%>

then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3318>go<s%> out of the <S%H1004>house<s%> to the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H5462>shut<s%> up the <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>

The <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall come <S%H7725>again<s%> on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> and <S%H7200>look.<s%> If the <S%H5061>plague<s%> has <S%H6581>spread<s%> in the <S%H7023>walls<s%> of the <S%H1004>house,<s%>

then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6680>command<s%> that they <S%H2502>take<s%> out the <S%H68>stones<s%> in <S%H2004>which<s%> is the <S%H5061>plague,<s%> and <S%H7993>cast<s%> them into an <S%H2931>unclean<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H2351>outside<s%> of the <S%H5892>city:<s%>

and he shall cause the <S%H1004>inside<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> to be <S%H7106>scraped<s%> all <S%H5439>over,<s%> and they shall <S%H8210>pour<s%> out the <S%H6083>mortar,<s%> that they <S%H7096>scraped<s%> <S%H2351>off,<s%> outside of the <S%H5892>city<s%> into an <S%H2931>unclean<s%> <S%H4725>place.<s%>

They shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H68>stones,<s%> and <S%H935>put<s%> them in the <S%H8478>place<s%> of those <S%H68>stones;<s%> and he shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H6083>mortar,<s%> and shall <S%H2902>plaster<s%> the <S%H1004>house.<s%>

"If the <S%H5061>plague<s%> comes <S%H7725>again,<s%> and <S%H6524>breaks<s%> out in the <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> he has <S%H2502>taken<s%> out the <S%H68>stones,<s%> and <S%H310>after<s%> he has <S%H7096>scraped<s%> the <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H310>after<s%> it was <S%H2902>plastered;<s%>

then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> in and <S%H7200>look;<s%> and <S%H5061>behold,<s%> if the plague has <S%H6581>spread<s%> in the <S%H1004>house,<s%> it is a <S%H3992>destructive<s%> <S%H6883>mildew<s%> in the <S%H1004>house.<s%> It is <S%H2931>unclean.<s%>

He shall break <S%H5422>down<s%> the <S%H1004>house,<s%> its <S%H68>stones,<s%> and its <S%H6086>timber,<s%> and all the <S%H1004>house<s%>'s <S%H6083>mortar.<s%> He shall carry them <S%H2351>out<s%> <S%H3318>of<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> into an <S%H2931>unclean<s%> <S%H4725>place.<s%>
"Moreover he who <S%H935>goes<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H3117>while<s%> it is <S%H5462>shut<s%> up shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> until the <S%H6153>evening.<s%>

He who <S%H7901>lies<s%> down in the <S%H1004>house<s%> shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes;<s%> and he who <S%H398>eats<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes.<s%>

"If the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall come <S%H935>in,<s%> and <S%H7200>examine<s%> <S%H5061>it,<s%> and behold, the plague <S%H6581>hasn't<s%> spread in the <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> was <S%H2902>plastered,<s%> then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall pronounce the <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H2891>clean,<s%> because the <S%H5061>plague<s%> is <S%H7495>healed.<s%>
